text: "Somehow trotting up to the Post Office," said Groat.

passages.fragment: Somehow trotting up to the Post Office
passages.full_quote: <used>Somehow trotting up to the Post Office</used> steps was not an option
We'll send the bill <used>to the Post Office, s</used>hall we?
"I was raised in <used>the Post Office," said Groat</used> behind him
